project.description:
Yocto Sumo Source Setup
매주 토요일 21:00 trigger됨. workspace 하위 디렉토리의 yocto_sumo_* 의 모든 dir 삭제 후 새로 받은 source를 copy
<< project list >> yocto_sumo_s5p4418_weekly yocto_sumo_s5p6818_weekly yocto_sumo_daudio-ref_weekly

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo "************************************" echo " Yocto Sumo Source CleanUp " echo "************************************" sudo rm -rf $WORKSPACE/../yocto_sumo_s5p4418_weekly sudo rm -rf $WORKSPACE/../yocto_sumo_s5p6818_weekly sudo rm -rf $WORKSPACE/../yocto_sumo_daudio-ref_weekly
echo "************************************" echo " Yocto Sumo Source Download " echo "************************************" repo init -u ssh://nxJenkins@review.gerrithub.io:29418/NexellCorp/yocto_manifest -b yocto-sumo sed -i 's/{USER_ID}/nxJenkins/g' .repo/manifests/remote_nexell_ssh.xml repo sync
echo "**********************************************" echo " Yocto Sumo Source copy to other projects " echo "**********************************************" cp -a $WORKSPACE $WORKSPACE/../yocto_sumo_s5p4418_weekly cp -a $WORKSPACE $WORKSPACE/../yocto_sumo_s5p6818_weekly cp -a $WORKSPACE $WORKSPACE/../yocto_sumo_daudio-ref_weekly
